short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An animated demo of what's possible with Chrome's text-to-speech API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a demo of the kind of effects you can achieve when you combine CSS animation with Chrome's text-to-speech API with word callbacks.
